Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| J SC |
| V OC |

These three properties are all related to the performance of the material in solar cell applications:

* PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) is the ratio of the output power to the input power of the solar cell.
* J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density) is the maximum current density that can be achieved by the solar cell.
* V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage) is the maximum voltage that can be achieved by the solar cell when it is not connected to a load.
